denver.uncertainty_estimate¶

class denver.uncertainty_estimate.UncertaintyEstimator(verbose)[source]¶

Bases: object

Estimate uncertainty score for a sample point

entropy(probs, softmax=False)[source]¶

The method to estimate uncertainty score

Parameters

  • probs – The probabilities predict

  • softmax – If True using softmax, (defalt=False)

Returns

entropy: The prediction of a T*N*C tensor with T: the number of samples, N: the batch size and C: the number of classes

get_uncertainty_score(method, model, sample, n_times=10)[source]¶

Get the uncertainty score of the sample.

Parameters

  • method – The method to calculate uncertainty score.

  • model – The selected model to predict.

  • sample – The sample to calculate uncertainty score.

  • n_times – The times predction.

Returns

results: A dict format as following: { ‘text’: sample, ‘intent’: iclass, ‘uncertainty_score’: value, ‘method’: method.__name__ }
